tooltip.cloche.cloche: Prevents all other drops except the main output
tooltip.cloche.main_output_upgrade: Doubles the main output (Stacks with other Main Output Upgrades)
tooltip.cloche.mutation_upgrade: Has a 25% chance to mutate the input seed! Mutation make the crops grow faster and produce more!
tooltip.cloche.mutation_upgrade_output: Give a %s%% chance to roll results again
tooltip.cloche.no_other_drops_upgrade: Prevents all other drops except the main output
tooltip.cloche.shears_upgrade: Add the Shears drop to the outputs
